channel.title: Please help me!
channel.description:
Heyy, yeah i need some help.. Well, when I equip my dragon fire shield it is equipped in the sword space and not the shield space. You know how to fix? Please help!
Heres a pic of the problem [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/10ib602.jpg[/img] See it?

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @TempahScape TempahScape
item.description:
@TempahScape wrote:

[quote=“Nightwolf1, post:12, topic:381741”]oh thanx alot its work but ihave onther problem after i add this code
when i try to wear claws its need 60 def too !!! how i can remove that and did only 60 att?[/quote]

you know i actually don’t know that… I’m gonna have a look into it

I can’t find it If I hear about it I will tell you

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @TempahScape TempahScape
item.description:
@TempahScape wrote:

[quote=“Nightwolf1, post:7, topic:381741”]help i have the same problem but not with the shild i can wear calws +shild!!
how i can fix that ?

and thanx![/quote]

I found out how to do that. In client.java (server sided) search for two_hand You will see something like this…

int targetSlot = 0;
targetSlot = itemType(wearID);
int[] two_hand = {35,667,746,2402,8002,11005, 7668, 11001, 7808, 841, 6609, 1319, 4718, 4726, 1409, 4710, 7158, 11011, 3204, 4755, 4153, 4827, 6528,843,845,849,847,853,851,859,861, 4734,4214,4215,4216,4217,4218,4219,4220,4221,4222,4223, 4747 };

In the first slot add the ID of your D claws, so it will end up like this My d claws id is 8002

int targetSlot = 0;
targetSlot = itemType(wearID);
int[] two_hand = {8002,35,667,746,2402,8002,11005, 7668, 11001, 7808, 841, 6609, 1319, 4718, 4726, 1409, 4710, 7158, 11011, 3204, 4755, 4153, 4827, 6528,843,845,849,847,853,851,859,861, 4734,4214,4215,4216,4217,4218,4219,4220,4221,4222,4223, 4747 };

Now save, close, and enjoy wearing d claws without a shield bothering you

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Nightwolf1, post:9, topic:381741”]i dont understand u av… but i can wear claws with sheild!!
i mean 1 arm with calws and the other with sheild![/quote]

Add your item Id to the “two_hand” array in client.java

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @fuery0w fuery0w
item.description:
@fuery0w wrote:

infalibl3:

i just lolled irl.

Lol.

Go to item.java and find: public static int shields[]
Add the item id of that shield in to it so it will look like this:

public static int shields[] = {####,####,####};

= Item Id.

My one looks like this

public static int shields[] = {1191,3095,3096,3097};

But mine has more codes than that

Read full topic
